title: Stocks Hold Near Record Before Jobs Data, Gold Up: Markets Wrap
description: Asian stocks hovered near record highs ahead of key US jobs data on Wednesday after weak retail sales reinforced bets that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates later this year.
content: Asian stocks hovered near record highs ahead of key US jobs data on Wednesday after weak retail sales reinforced bets that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates later this year.
